00007 /* This reads in the line */
00008 void rwm_line(int rwmln){
00009 int rwmdone=0, rwma=0, rwmb=0, rwmstop=-1, rwmmt=-1, rwmnl=-1;
00010 linetype rwmlt;
00011 char rwmaCL='I',rwmaRN='I';
00012 /* Read in first six characters and determine line type */
00013 if(DEBUG>=1){printf("rwm_line 1\n");}
00014 for(rwma=0;rwma<6;rwma++){
00015         if(rwmstop!=0){
00016                 rwmdone=fgetc(IN);
00017 if(DEBUG>=2){printf("Just got new rwmdone \n");}
00018                 if(rwmdone==EOF){read_neek("EOF",rwmln,rwma);}
00019                 }
00020         if(((rwmdone=='\n')||(rwmdone==' '))&&(rwma==0)){
00021 if(DEBUG>=1){printf("Empty line found \n");}
00022                 if(rwmdone=='\n'){rwmnl=0;}
00023                 rwmmt=0;
00024                 }
00025         if((rwmdone=='\n')||(rwmstop==0)){
00026 if(DEBUG>=2){printf("resetting rwmdone \n");}
00027                 rwmnl=0;
00028                 rwmdone=' ';
00029                 rwmstop=0;
00030                 }
00031         ln[rwmln-1].f[0].c[rwma]=rwmdone;
00032         }
00033 if(rwmmt==0){ /* If this is an empty line */
00034         if(rwmnl!=0){
00035                 rwmdone=fgetc(IN);
00036                 while(rwmdone!='\n'){
00037                         rwmdone=fgetc(IN);
00038                         }
00039                 }
00040         if(WARN!=0){fprintf(OUT,"\n");}
00041         return;
00042         }
00043 if(DEBUG>=1){printf("rwm_line 2\n");}
00044 // if the first six chars seem to be ok...
00045 // null-terminate the string
00046 ln[rwmln-1].f[0].c[6]='\0';
00047 
00048 // made it here?  find out the line type
00049 if(DEBUG>=1){printf("rwm_line 3 fieldname is >>>%s<<<\n",ln[rwmln-1].f[0].c);}
00050 rwmlt=get_type(ln[rwmln-1].f[0].c); 
00051 ln[rwmln-1].a=rwmlt.a; // class 
00052 ln[rwmln-1].b=rwmlt.b; // number for the sub-class
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056 if(DEBUG>=1){printf("rwmlt.a is %d and rwmlt.b is %d\n",rwmlt.a, rwmlt.b);}
00057 /* Assign action switch from internal defaults */
00058 if(DEBUG>=1){printf("rwm_line 4\n");}
00059 if(DEBUG>=0){printf("rwmlt.a is %d and rwmlt.b is %d\n",rwmlt.a,rwmlt.b);} 
00060 /* If get_type returned a valid class: */
00061 
00062 
00063 if(rwmlt.a==-1){ // If this line type is unknown
00064 // do something....
00065         rwmaCL='I';
00066         rwmaRN='D';
00067         }
00068 //If there line was less than 6 characters
00069 if(rwmstop == 0)
00070  return;
00071 
00072 // If the rule is to modify, read in the rest of the line, first...  
00073 for(rwma=1;rwma<pdb_a[rwmlt.a].b[rwmlt.b].f;rwma++){
00074         for(rwmb=0;rwmb<pdb_a[rwmlt.a].b[rwmlt.b].c[rwma];rwmb++){
00075                 ln[rwmln-1].f[rwma].c[rwmb]=fgetc(IN);
00076                 //fprintf(OUTC,"%c",ln[rwmln-1].f[rwma].c[rwmb]);
00077                 if(ln[rwmln-1].f[rwma].c[rwmb]=='\n'){
00078                         rwmb=pdb_a[rwmlt.a].b[rwmlt.b].c[rwma];
00079                         rwma=pdb_a[rwmlt.a].b[rwmlt.b].f;
00080                         }
00081                 if(ln[rwmln-1].f[rwma].c[rwmb]==EOF){
00082                         read_neek("EOF",(rwmln),(rwma+1));
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085         ln[rwmln-1].f[rwma].c[rwmb]='\0';
00086         } 
00087 if(DEBUG>=0){printf("rwm_line 13\n");}
00088 if((WARN==0)&&(SILENT!=0)){fflush(OUTC);}
00089 return;
00090 }
